description: Sartaaj is on the road most of the time kicking off his creative projects. Currently he is promoting his signing on the Rukus Avenue music label. Don't miss the opportunity to catch up with him on tour.

title: DANIEL SLOSS: CAN’T - India Tour 2024 - Bengaluru
location: WJJC+JP8, 18th Main Rd, John Nagar, Koramangala, Bengaluru,
description: Daniel’s previous ground-breaking, global smash-hits include ‘HUBRiS’ (the world’s biggest solo comedy touring show and 5th biggest ticket selling event for most of 2021 as reported in Pollstar) and ‘X’ (his acclaimed tour de force about sexual assault. ‘X’ toured non-stop for 300 performances over 17 months around the globe, traversing Europe, UK, U.S., Canada, Australia, Hong Kong, Japan and even packing a Moscow arena (becoming Russia’s biggest-ever English language comedy show and creating a sensation with a joke about the importance of sex education – not a taboo subject in Putin’s Russia – an illegal one.). The film of ‘X’ is on HBO in USA, Canada and was the first UK comedy special with a UK premiere in cinemas, following a nationwide release at Vue

title: Sitar For Mental Health
subtitle: HSBC presents ‘SFMH’ - Rishab Rikhiram Sharma
location: Silver Oak Plantation, 25, Mudalappa St, Anjanadri Layout, Konanakunte, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560062
description:
Sitar for Mental Health events are immersive experiences that bridge ancient practices of sound and energy medicine using traditional Indian music, designed to invoke states of deep reflection, receptivity, and introspection.

Sitarist, music producer, and mental health advocate, Rishab Rikhiram Sharma, is made for the spotlight and his multi-faceted career is shaping up to be nothing short of iconic. Rishab presents his massive fourth Pan India SFMH Tour across eleven cities. Bringing awareness towards Mental health by inducing education and experiences of the auditory sensory processing system which Classical music brings forth and re-introduces the sound of the Sitar as a transformational tool.

title: Seedhe Maut - Lunch Break India Tour 2024
subtitle: Still On A Lunch Break!
location: Bengaluru
description:
Catch the 'best in the business' in a city near you! Seedhe Maut are taking their hit mixtape on a massive 12-city pan-India tour. The dynamic duo, known for their explosive live performances, will be playing an extended set and will feature several special guests as well as a few surprises! Get your tickets now! 

Having mastered the art of delivering razor-sharp rhymes - this Delhi-based duo comprising Encore ABJ and Calm has used their lyrical dexterity to push forward the boundaries of Hip-Hop in India. Presenting Hindi Rap in a revolutionary new format, Seedhe Maut is taking the industry by storm and is unanimously regarded as the next big thing to break in the rapidly growing subculture landscape.

Age Restriction: 16+

title: SCC SkyCinema - Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: Konanakunte Cross Metro Station, Anjanadri Layout, Konanakunte
description:
"Life mein jitna bhi try karo, kuch na kuch toh chhootega hi. Toh jahaan hai, wahi ka maza lete hai.""- Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani

Enjoy your favorite movie on a breezy terrace, perched on the rooftop of Forum South Bangalore Mall. Here you'll have an unobstructed view of the night sky, creating a unique and immersive cinema experience as you sink into comfy bean bags or mattresses and watch the movie on a large screen with the skyline of the city as your backdrop.

Screening Schedule: 

16th March, Saturday - Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani

Gates open at 7:00 pm and the movie starts at 7.30 pm.

Seating:

Seating will be allocated on a first-come-first-served basis.

We recommend that you carry warm clothes/blankets for your comfort during the screening.

title: SCC Open Air Cinema - Notting Hill
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: RMZ Eco World Rd, Adarsh Palm Retreat, Bellandur
description:
"I'm just a girl, standing in front of a boy, asking him to love her. And I think we have a future together." - Notting Hill

Join us for an evening of laughter, love, and unexpected connections as Sunset Cinema Club presents a screening of this timeless classic at Ecodeck.

Located in Bangalore's bustling metropolis, this business hub transforms into a haven of relaxation and entertainment as the sun sets and the stars begin to emerge, as your film screening begins. Enjoy your favorite film on a large screen with surround sound, as you sink into comfy bean bags, in the great outdoors.

Screening Schedule:

16th March, Saturday - Notting Hill

Gates open at 7:00 pm and the movie starts at 7.30 pm.

title: SCC Picnic Cinema - Under The Tuscan Sun
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: 82/2, Gantiganahalli
description:
"Unthinkably good things can happen, even late in the game." - Under The Tuscan Sun 

Embark on a journey to the sun-soaked landscapes of Italy as Sunset Cinema Club presents a special screening of the enchanting film, "Under the Tuscan Sun." Join us for an evening of romance, self-discovery, and the picturesque beauty of Tuscan dreams under the open sky at Garden City Beer Collective.

Come for an evening of cinematic delight, as the sun goes down, and the show comes on! Enjoy a picnic-y ambiance, where you can sit or even lie down on comfy bean bags, surrounded by lush green grass! String lights illuminate the area, casting a warm glow that sets the perfect mood for the evening, while you enjoy your favorite film on a large screen with surround sound accompanied by delicious munchies and drinks!

His new hour of jokes is not to be missed!

description: Sunburn Holi Weekend is back again with a bang! Embark on a beat-dropping voyage as Marshmello bounces into India, turning up the volume across four electrifying cities. "Keep It Mello" as the bass drops in Bengaluru on March 22nd, "Silence" yourself with anticipation in Delhi on March 23rd, let the "Wolves" out in Mumbai on March 24th, and finally, "Find Me" in the crowd in Pune on March 25th. The thrill is real as Marshmello brings his iconic helmet and chart-topping tunes, ensuring every beat and drop is packed with his signature energy.

description:
Celebrating the timeless music of Usha Uthup, who has captivated audiences worldwide for 55 years and counting. This Concert celebrates Music Diva's 55-year Musical Journey.

The concert marks the 2nd collaboration between Usha Uthup and Bangalore's very own Multi-lingual, Multi-genre band - Alive India Rockstars (AIR), mentored by Supratiek Ghosh - Founder of Alive India & Lead Singer of Iconic Band Aurko 

The Concert Series is Alive India's Fundraiser & Awareness Campaign in support of Sponsoring deserving musicians with Free Food, Shelter, Upskill Training & Sustainable Career under Alive India Music Foundation NGO's MSR (Musicians Social Responsibility)

title: Darshan Raval India Tour| Bangalore
location: Whitefield Main Road, Mahadevpura
description: Get ready for an unforgettable musical journey as Darshan Raval, the heartthrob of Indian music, embarks on his much-anticipated nationwide tour - This extraordinary concert series promises to be a celebration of love, emotions, and the magic of Darshan Raval's soulful voice. The tour kicks off in Surat and will traverse the length and breadth of India, bringing Darshan's chart-topping hits to fans across the country. Audiences can expect a visually stunning and immersive experience, with state-of-the-art stage production, lighting, and sound engineering to complement the musical extravaganza. Each concert is meticulously crafted to provide an intimate yet electrifying atmosphere, allowing fans to connect with Darshan Raval on a personal level.

location: Plot No.121, Road No.5, Export Promotion Industrial Park, EPIP 2nd Phase, Whitefield Industrial Area
description: Welcome to Maha Holi 2024, where the rhythm of joy meets the hues of celebration. title: Aratu Live In Concert
location: 22, 1st Main Rd, Visthar, Bengaluru
description: 🎵 Get ready to hit the high notes of fun with ARATU – the band that's pitch-perfect for your good vibes weekend! Let our melodies be the key to unlocking your dance floor potential – it's time to break out those treble moves! 💃 Aratu's tunes are the rhythm to your good vibes symphony, turning every event into a major chord of joy! 🎉🕺 So, bass-ically, prepare for a night where the beats drop, and the laughter rises! 🚀

title: Joe Armon Jones + On the Jungle Floor
location: 1st floor of Gillys redefined,# 413, 100 Feet Road,, 4th Block, Koramangala, KHB Block Koramangala, Koramangala 4-B Block, 5th Block, Koramangala
description: Saras Co. presents a one-of-a-kind piano solo showcase featuring London's own piano maestro and producer extraordinaire, Joe Armon-Jones. Embark on a sonic odyssey through the vibrant tapestry of the UK Jazz scene with a curated listening session led by On the Jungle Floor. Delve into the world of jazz with OTJF’s very own Adithya's captivating vinyl set. But the excitement doesn't end there. Brace yourself for an unforgettable crescendo as Joe Armon-Jones takes center stage for a soul-stirring piano solo performance. Cap off the night with Joe Armon-Jones’ soulful piano solo and an improvised trio set featuring Dhir Mody and Nathan Thomas from Drumani Bass. Join us for a boundary-breaking experience where music takes center stage

title: Parikrama Tour
venue: Hard Rock Cafe, St Marks Rd
location: 40, St Marks Rd, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description: Play For A Cause is Seagram’s 100 Pipers Glassware multi-year initiative that has successfully championed important causes like Meals for the Underprivilege, Supporting relief efforts for flood and earthquake victims, and contributing to making the planet greener through tree plantation drive, amongst many others. This year, 100 Pipers Glassware Play For A Cause is championing the important cause of spreading awareness about eye donation. According to government sources*, with approximately 1.5 million Corneal Blind People in India, and 40 thousand new cases annually, the need for corneal donation is critical. Despite this, only 25 to 30 thousand eyes are collected each year, falling far short of the required number. As a country of 1.4 Billion people, we can do a lot better.

title: Love of Live ft. The Love Buzz
location: 1st floor of Gillys redefined,# 413, 100 Feet Road,, 4th Block, Koramangala, KHB Block Koramangala, Koramangala 4-B Block, 5th Block, Koramangala
description: Known for their high energy sets and hypnotic melodies, The Love Buzz describe themselves as the scuzzy power pop princes of Ireland. They are the tongue in cheek beacon of hope blending their hyper-caustic pogo punk with timeless pop bangers. ‘Their guitars are crunchy, their drums are bullying and their basslines knit it all together like a middle child hatching a plan.’ With their first EP Candyflip, the band explored different variants in style and challenged the genre locked norms of today's scene, breeding a caustic hyper-saturated concoction of Punk Pop and Indie. Hot Press Magazine cited them as “Pure off the bone punkadelic pleasure!” In a review of their Single ‘The Picky Eater’. After gigging extensively around the country and beyond, the guys put their heads down again, worked on new songs, and headed back to the studio with the finished creation being their EP

title: Mid Wicket Stories
venue: ITC Gardenia, a Luxury Collection Hotel
location: 1, Residency Rd, Ashok Nagar
description: Stumps Up for Stories: An Evening with Cricket's Icons Sir Geoffrey Boycott and Sunil Gavaskar. Calling all cricket fans for timeless conversation. Join us for an unforgettable evening as we discuss the legends who shaped the game we love. Don't miss this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to hear the inside stories from the heroes of cricket. They are going to discuss cricket stories from the time when the internet was not there. Get ready for a journey back in time as we bring together legendary cricketers for a timeless conversation that transcends eras! From Yesterday's Glory to Today's Inspiration: Join us for an unforgettable evening of cricket stories and timeless wisdom from the cricketing legends who've shaped the game we adore. It's not just an event; it's a pilgrimage for every cricket fan seeking to relive the magic of yesteryears.

title: Under The Sky Sundowner At Sheraton Grand
venue: Sheraton Grand Bengaluru Whitefield Hotel & Convention Center
location: Prestige Shantiniketan Hoodi, Whitefield, Thigalarapalya, Krishnarajapura
description: Experience the ultimate poolside soirée at Sundowner, an enchanting evening under the starlit sky in Whitefield. Dive into the mesmerizing beats of the best melodic house and Hindi melodic house, enhanced with live instruments, making it a truly unique affair. For the first time in Whitefield, indulge in a pool party like no other, featuring great music that will keep you dancing all night long. Savor irresistible offers on beverages and delectable food options, adding to the allure of the evening. Held at the luxurious Sheraton Grand Hotel Whitefield, this event promises an ambiance of luxury and relaxation. Let the tunes curated by Altspace Live elevate your experience, creating memories that will last a lifetime. Gather your friends and family for a memorable evening by the poolside.

title: Catharsis Vol 3
location: 1st floor of Gillys redefined,# 413, 100 Feet Road,, 4th Block, Koramangala, KHB Block Koramangala, Koramangala 4-B Block, 5th Block, Koramangala
description: Catharsis Vol. 3 invites you to immerse yourself in a night of musical discovery and raw emotion. As the latest installment in our groundbreaking gig series, Catharsis continues its commitment to showcasing original music from diverse genres. Our mission is to provide a platform for exceptionally talented bands, connecting them with audiences eager to explore beyond their musical comfort zones and revel in the exhilaration of live performances. This edition of Catharsis promises an eclectic lineup that promises to captivate and electrify. Catharsis Vol. 3 invites you to embrace the spirit of discovery, transcend musical boundaries, and experience the thrill of live music. Join us for a night that promises to be a celebration of originality, talent, and the unifying power of music.

title: The Spaven D&B Curation
location: 1st floor of Gillys redefined,# 413, 100 Feet Road,, 4th Block, Koramangala, KHB Block Koramangala, Koramangala 4-B Block, 5th Block, Koramangala
description: Saras Co. presents The Spaven D&B Curation, a special curation, and reinterpretation of timeless jungle classics by UK-based producer/composer and drummer Richard Spaven, with Chris 'Fatty' Hargreaves on bass, supported by Mumbai’s very own Drum and Bass. Experience the finest live D&B from the UK through a unique sonic journey, exploring the roots of jungle and drum & bass while paying homage to the architects of sound system culture. Richard will be joined by Christopher Hargreaves (Fatty Bassman) on bass. Expect classics, and improvisation, all while honoring the origins of Jungle/D&B. Stick around for an intimate talk/dialogue with Richard Spaven, delving into the significance of classic tunes and offering a deeper understanding of their cultural impact and enduring relevance, while dissecting the tunes that shaped a movement.

title: Tribute to KK Ft. Root Three Five
location: Unit G-25 & 26, Ground Floor, Park Square Mall International Tech Park, Bangalore, Pattandur Agrahara
description: Tribute to KK Ft. Root Three Five (From Hyderabad) Root Three Five (35) exploded onto the live music scene after winning the Nxt Big Star competition in 2017. The Root 35 band blends soulful Indian and Western music and unique ideas. The band blends soulful Indian and Western music with high-energy rock and unique ideas. Every member brings in their distinct sound and personality to collectively form a tight performing unit. In a short period, they have gained a lot of traction and love from their audiences. So what are you waiting for? Catch them performing live KK`s hits. Just reserve your spots and be ready to experience a night full of rock `n` roll.

title: Mahindra Percussion Festival 2024
venue: Prestige Srihari Khoday Centre For Performing Arts
location: Silver Oak Plantation, 25, Mudalappa St, Anjanadri Layout, Konanakunte
description: Evoking a celebration of rhythm that deeply stirs human emotions, the Mahindra Percussion Festival in association with The Hindu is a uniquely mesmerizing culmination of music, food, festivity, and culture with the power of percussion and expression at its core as it enables us to rise to the beat! From the earliest times, drums and their rhythms have been at the center of social and cultural activities worldwide; it is said to be our oldest musical percussion instrument The festival intends to be a first-of-its-kind platform that will traverse various music genres, all led by the beats of percussion and celebrate the heartbeat of music by bringing together timeless rhythm and lending it to contemporary perspectives. The festival will feature performances by a motley of homegrown and international percussion artists.

title: Good Boy Better Show ft. Aashish Solanki
location: 6/B, Mahatyagi Laksmidevi Rd, Koramangala 1A Block, Koramangala 3 Block, Koramangala
description: Good boy Aashish is the ideal kid every parent wishes for. His stories and observations will make you laugh and go Ye to mere saath bhi hua hai bhai at the same time. Aashish Solanki is the winner of Comicstaan season 3. When a mathematics graduate writes jokes, they have to be intelligent. Full of hilarious observations and CLEAN jokes, the show is for anyone and everyone, especially family. Just make sure that your parents don't take the good boy home instead of you :P

title: Gaurav Kapoor LIVE
location: Cassia Block, Campus, JP Nagar 7th Phase
description: Come and enjoy the super relatable and super funny, Gaurav Kapoor in his live show. One of the funniest and most prolific stand-up acts in the country, Gaurav Kapoor`s Vlogs have created a fan base of their own. 1M+ on YouTube, 300K on Insta, an IMDB 8.2 rated special on Amazon Prime, His massive live shows and regular VLogs are making him a household name and proving that one can truly live his art if he is brutally honest. His journalism degree and retail job experience now seem like stories from another life but Gaurav claims he still remembers all the keyboard shortcuts, just in case.

description: Comedy Shots presents Wild Comedy Nights. Add some food and beverages to the mix and the evening promises to be the one to remember. Come down and Support artists.
